Grouped_Utterances: I want to try going to the grocery store next, but I’m a bit scared.

It was a bit nerve-wracking at first, but once I got there, I felt okay.  A little. I felt anxious at first, but it faded as I walked around.  I’ve been feeling a bit more paranoid lately, especially in crowded places. I went to a concert last week, and I felt really on edge. I tried to focus on my breathing, but I still felt overwhelmed.
I feel more prepared. It makes me feel like I have some control. Thank you! I feel more hopeful.
Hi, Ellie! I’ve been doing better, I think. I managed to go to the park a couple of times. I treated myself to a nice coffee afterward, just like I planned. I’ll treat myself to a nice dinner after.

Yes, I reminded myself to breathe and I used the affirmation we created. Maybe I could go during a quieter time, like early in the morning. Okay, I could make a list beforehand to keep me focused. How about creating a “safety plan” for when you’re in crowded places?  You could include your breathing exercises, affirmations, and even a way to step outside if needed.
I could aim for this weekend. I want to try going to the grocery store and see how it goes.
